briefdescription.para: Toggles override application icon action when loading a published project at ManiVault startup.
Construct with pointer to parent object.
Set the main window icon to the override application icon.

parameterdescription.para: Variant map representation of the image action

simplesect.para: Variant representation of the image action

briefdescription.para: Signals that the current icon changed to icon.
Set the application icon to the default.

detaileddescription.para: Note: This action is developed for internal use only
